audioText: Il faut absolument que cette personne coupable descende de son piédestal et avoue ses erreurs avant que l'espoir de réconciliation ne disparaisse complètement dans notre organisation.
question: What must happen for reconciliation to remain possible?
options: The guilty person must come down from their pedestal and admit their errors
The organization must restructure its management hierarchy completely
All employees must participate in mandatory conflict resolution training
The investigation must conclude with formal legal proceedings
explanation: The text states 'Il faut absolument que cette personne coupable descende de son piédestal et avoue ses erreurs avant que l'espoir de réconciliation ne disparaisse complètement' - This guilty person absolutely must come down from their pedestal and admit their errors before the hope of reconciliation disappears completely. 'Descende' is the subjunctive form after 'il faut que'.
